comment: This is perposterous and racest! How can you charge an ethnic minority with ethnic violations? Youll be hearing from my consituents in November and if you come on my property, Ill turn my rockweilers loose on you!

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / perposterous
                  :domain (t / this))
            :op2 (r / racest
                  :domain t))
      :snt2 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (c / charge-05
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / minority
                        :mod (e / ethnic))
                  :ARG2 (v / violate-01
                        :ARG0 m2
                        :ARG1 (e2 / ethnic))
                  :manner (a2 / amr-unknown)))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (h / hear-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG2 (c2 / consituent
                        :poss (ii / i))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :month 11))
            :op2 (t2 / turn-over-12
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (a4 / animal
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Rockweiler")
                        :poss ii)
                  :condition (c3 / come-01
                        :ARG1 y2
                        :ARG4 (p3 / property
                              :poss ii)))))
